data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cundinamarca. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cundinamarca, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Cundinamarca, Colombia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Cundinamarca, Colombia.
data.prayer: Spirit, make yourself real to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Cundinamarca to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Cundinamarca.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Cundinamarca, Colombia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Cundinamarca, Colombia.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cundinamarca, Colombia has a population of 3,243,000.

We estimate Cundinamarca has 348,019 people who might know Jesus, 2,686,543 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 208,437 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Cundinamarca, Colombia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
